statements.query: MATCH (n:GitLabProject)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GitLabGroup{id: $GITLAB_GROUP_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:GitLabProject)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GitLabGroup{id: $GITLAB_GROUP_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
